project(OTBMapnik)

set(OTBMapnik_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRS
  ${MAPNIK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${ICUUC_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${LTDL_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${FREETYPE_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  ${AGG_INCLUDE_DIRS}
  )

set(OTBMapnik_LIBRARIES
  ${MAPNIK_LIBRARIES}
  ${ICUUC_LIBRARIES}
  ${LTDL_LIBRARIES}
  ${FREETYPE_LIBRARIES}  
  )

otb_module_impl()
